# Other arthropod vectors

::: {.callout-note title="Infections"}
**Ticks**
- Lyme disease (*Borrellia spp.*)
- babesiosis
- ehrlichiosis
- Rocky Mountain Spotted Fever (*Rickettsia rickettsii*)
- anaplasmosis
- Southern Tick-Associated Rash Illness
- Tick-Borne Relapsing Fever, and tularemia
- Colorado tick fever
- Powassan encephalitis
- Q fever
  
**Chiggers**
- Scrub typhus (*Orientia tsutsugamushi*)

**Biting midge**
- Oropouche virus

**Kissing bugs**
- Chagas disease

**Sand flies**
- Leishmaniasis
- Oroya fever
:::
